Interface DefaultSelectionEventManager.EventTranslator<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultSelectionEventManager.BlacklistEventTranslator, DefaultSelectionEventManager.CheckboxEventTranslator, DefaultSelectionEventManager.WhitelistEventTranslator
Enclosing class:
DefaultSelectionEventManager<T>
public static interface DefaultSelectionEventManager.EventTranslator<T>
Translates CellPreviewEvents into DefaultSelectionEventManager.SelectActions.
